title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.65 - Severance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.65 - Severance

State Regulations

Upon its own motion, or upon motion of any party, the

Board may, for good cause, order any proceeding severed with respect to some or
all issues or parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.65

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
